Description:
Raising funds from private equity deals or private equity funds.
Target clients include institutional investors, UHNWI, HNIs, family offices, or family funds.
Good connections and networks with which he has raised money in the past and has good terms.Skills
Skills:
Someone who has worked in Dubai or KSA and has a ‘tried & tested’ client base. Past success is a prerequisite for this role.
Someone who has strong sales skills is outgoing, dynamic, and energetic. An individual with a pleasant personality who is looking for a challenge and is inclined to fast-paced growth in his career
Someone who has a track record in
Experience in private banks wealth managers is preferred.
Must have raised money for private equity deals or funds from institutional investors, corporate clients, HNI’s, UHNWI’s, family offices, etc.
The individual should have good connections and networks with which he has raised money in the past and has good terms.
Ideally, someone who is 35 years old or younger however can be flexible for a very strong candidate.
Any nationality with contacts in the UAE and/or KSA. (Saudi National Preferred) since predominately this role's core focus will be on KSA.
This role is an individual contributor role.
The role is to raise money for the company’s various funds situated in UAE and KSA
Typically, the funds required to be raised are SAR 100 in the first 2 years.
Should have qualified for Capital Market Exam 1 & 4 or CFA with CME 1 qualification.
Someone who has experience in buy-side and sell-side transactions and evaluations.
Someone who has strong technical skills, because when the transactions are done, he/she will be handling the post-management relationship.
Someone who has a strong Private Equity background only.
looking for candidates who have funding exposure in Entertainment, Food and beverage, Healthcare, Technology, Media, etc.
Ideal candidates should not have more than 10% real estate funding exposure to a PE portfolio.
